name: Prime 8 Consulting
overview:
Driving Success is in Our DNA

Our passion for what we do is ingrained in who we are. We pride ourselves in delivering fresh perspectives and innovative ideas. Whether it’s moving a project forward, implementing a program or designing a successful strategy from the ground up, we have just the right consultant to get the job done and deliver outstanding results.

Powered by “The Great 8” Our 8 value-adding service lines provide solutions for clients of all sizes, from multinational organizations to local small businesses. We partner with our clients to the end, leveraging deep industry experience to provide practical business strategies and technology solutions that deliver results. Our consultants bring years of relevant experience from a range of companies – Microsoft, Boeing, Hitachi, Starbucks, Cap Gemini and T-Mobile to name a few. We firmly believe our clients’ success is our success, pushing us to go the extra mile to deliver stand-out solutions.

We’re only as great as our people Prime 8 consultants are truly invested in what they do at work and in the community. As a company, we strive to provide an environment that nurtures people’s talents and career goals so as individuals, and as a team, great things can be accomplished. Whether it’s turning out innovative marketing solutions or rallying together to serve our community, everything we do is rooted in our 8 core values

providerships.title: A concise vision and strategy document is critical to successful communications and adoption of your strategy. It is the most powerful and galvanizing instrument that enables broad scale evangelism of your strategy up, down and across your organization.

Whether you’re a small local business or a Fortune 500 company, having a marketing strategy in place that effectively says who you are, what you do, and why consumers should pay attention is vital for standing out in today’s crowded marketplace.
